nodes.text: Docking Bay 27 was a docking bay located in the Mezenti Spaceport on Nar Shaddaa. During the Cold War, a bounty hunter participating in the Great Hunt confronted a Bith security expert Zee K'lin in the docking bay, demanding the codes to Eidolon Security encryption programs.
Docking Bay 27 appears as an area on Nar Shaddaa in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission.
